dcterms:description: The Matterport3D (MP3D) dataset is a benchmark dataset of indoor scenes used for training and evaluating navigation tasks, providing RGB-D data in various indoor environments.
dcterms:title: Matterport3D (MP3D)

dcterms:description: AI Habitat is a platform designed for embodied AI research, providing a visually realistic simulation environment for training and evaluating navigation algorithms.
dcterms:title: AI Habitat
